item.title: Serving PyTorch Predictions, Extending CLI Tools, and JavaScript Engines
item.description:
Topics:

  • Serving PyTorch Predictions with Rocket via @DanielPBank
  • Extending a File Renaming CLI Tool via @RyanFickenscher
  • Boa JavaScript Lexer, Parser, Compiler built with Rust via @RyanFickenscher
  • Rust on PyGamer Updates via @jacobrosenthal
  • Smol Async Example via @jacobrosenthal
  • Caveat on Using rust-analyzer in VSCode

item.title: Discord Bots, Digital Signal Processing, and TensorFlow Lite
item.description:
Topics:

  • Discord Bots via @mysteriouspants
  • Digital Signal Processing via @jacobrosenthal
  • Managing Game State via @DanielPBank

item.title: Scientific Computing
item.description: First Chris Miller talks the ins and outs of making your own crate. Then Daniel Bank talks regression and classification over data sets. Finally Craig Bishop will close with 3D math and simple rendering with Rust using the crate cgmath. Think: vectors, matrices, transforms, projections, Phong lighting, and image output.
